author: jeremias
msg: Following a clarification by the XSL FO SG, space traits are only set on the first and last area generated by an FO, and not on every area anymore.
Note: this change brings another issue in column balancing to light. That's the reason for disabling one of the tests. I wasn't able to find a quick fix there.

author: bayard
msg: using bcel as a test zone for projects.apache.org; hope you guys don't mind. this one is generated from a project.xml
